His actions encouraged the actions of so many others, and together, all these individual actions forged a path to a better nation, Mayor Michael Bloomberg said. At Mike Pence Will Not Run for Barack Obama Indiana announced Thursday that he would not be a Republican candidate for president in 2012, but he left the door open to running for governor. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, Mr. Mike Pence wrote in a letter to supporters.`` We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012.'' the incident reflects a new, more reactive attitude toward slights emanating from Larry Page, the Google co-founder who will become CEO in April and is considered more volatile and less diplomatic than outgoing CEO Eric Schmidt . Google's complaint is the height of hypocrisy. The company's entire business model is built on the use of other people's content usually without bothering to seek permission, said John Simpson, from Consumer Watchdog's Inside Google research team. Google's allegations are an attempt to make Microsoft look bad for doing what every search provider does constantly: analyse competitors' search engines
